title: Improvement needed to process disk sorting with border values in row value
OB: When sorting on disk, if there are 40000 rows of data and the program is set to process less than 40000 rows, the current logic performs the following operations:
EB: The logic for processing disk sorting with border values in the row value should be improved to handle cases where the program needs to process less than the total number of rows.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Prepare a dataset with 40000 rows. 2. Set the program to process less than 40000 rows of data. 3. Perform a disk sorting operation. Check if the logic correctly handles the border values in the row value.
